name: Chan Marks
description: The pictures tell you its a 90wh battery with a 12battery life when this model is a 56wh battery. I get around 3 hours doing basically nothing, and this is with battery saver on and turning off the RTX gpu and switching to integrated.

name: Parsons Wise
description: Great look, feel, speed etc of this laptop. I run Xbox games, steam games, most AAA games requiring high frame rates and this laptop only occasionally lags. For the price, it's a beast. For everyday work it's brilliant. The only down side is the relatively short battery life and lack of camera. Neither feature is a deal breaker. Ram is upgradeable, so are drives. It's heavy but it's not an ultra-portable so not a big deal. The fan noise when gaming is mildly annoying but not so much as to distract from game play.r

name: Rae Larsen
description: Wow! The best gaming laptop period. First of all it had the ports built into the laptop is major!!! Very fast and perfect for gaming no lag very smooth like butter!!!

name: Cooper Parsons
description: I purchased this computer with the intent of taking it to college. Everything appeared to work fine until I started plugging in my peripherals and customizing the performance settings. The fan mode continuously changed from silent to performance and back again and displayed a pop-up in the middle of the screen, and there was no customization option to prevent it. The volume muted each time I closed a tab or pop-up, or even x-ed out an ad in YouTube.

name: Vivian Doyle
description: Minim tempor amet consectetur ullamco aliqua. Minim mollit veniam duis veniam qui non minim veniam esse aute. Deserunt incididunt occaecat labore elit ut nulla in. Minim ex consequat magna minim eiusmod. Culpa nulla culpa in aliqua. Consequat quis ullamco cillum non consectetur veniam qui labore.

name: Mann Mcmillan
description: The laptop is indeed the best for the money. But, the shipping sucked. My nicely boxed beauty arrived inside a shipping box that was too big for the Asus box with NO bubble wrap to keep it from sliding around and thus not be banged up from being thrown around during shipping. Not happy with that thought of what was going on during shipping. However, this laptop is fortunately working and is AWESOME.

name: Bolton Haley
description: DGreat look, feel, speed etc of this laptop. I run Xbox games, steam games, most AAA games requiring high frame rates and this laptop only occasionally lags. For the price, it's a beast. For everyday work it's brilliant. The only down side is the relatively short battery life and lack of camera. Neither feature is a deal breaker. Ram is upgradeable, so are drives. It's heavy but it's not an ultra-portable so not a big deal.
